title: Professional Summary
text:
This website has been created for my class, AD688 (Cloud Analytics), which is towards my MSc in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University.
If you would like to contact me, please feel free to email me: bdegouw@bu.edu

title: Bowen de Gouw’s Website
text:
Kia Ora! I am Bowen de Gouw
I was originally born in the Netherlands, but grew up in Auckland, New Zealand. At the age of 18 I moved to Boston, MA to take up an Athlethic Scholarship at Boston University, where I was a four year member and team captain of the Men’s Rowing Team.
I am currently a masters student at Boston University, studying Applied Business Analytics. My focus is on statistical modeling, machine learning, and cloud based tools.
Previously, I did my undergraduate studies at Boston University’s Questrom School of Business where I gained a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration.





Celebrating my Graduation from Boston University’s DeWolfe Boathouse, May 2025





Based in Boston, MA
LinkedIn - Github - Email
